sentences.en: Bob took his savings out of the bank to buy a bicycle.
sentences.cn: 鲍勃从银行取出存款去买自行车.

sentences.en: By this time he had used up all his savings.
sentences.cn: 到这时,他的存款已全部用完.

sentences.en: Even small savings can add up.
sentences.cn: 甚至从小处节省下来的钱也能积少成多。

sentences.en: He made off with all the old man's savings.
sentences.cn: 他卷走了这个老人所有的积蓄.

sentences.en: He paid £20 into his savings account.
sentences.cn: 他往自己的储蓄账户上存了20英镑。

sentences.en: Her savings were in the First National Bank.
sentences.cn: 她的存款以前在第一国民银行。

sentences.en: His image was tarnished by the savings and loan scandal.
sentences.cn: 他的形象因为那桩储蓄信贷丑闻而受损。

sentences.en: I can't afford the vacation, for it would eat up my savings.
sentences.cn: 我度不起假, 那样会把我的积蓄用光的.

sentences.en: Keep savings as a buffer against unexpected cash needs.
sentences.cn: 存些积蓄以备不时之需。

sentences.en: National Savings gross sales in June totalled £709 million.
sentences.cn: 6月份国民储蓄机构的总销售额为7.09亿英镑。

sentences.en: Philip and I pooled our savings to start up my business.
sentences.cn: 我和菲利普把积蓄凑到一起开办了我的公司。

sentences.en: Savings schemes are the best retail investment products on offer.
sentences.cn: 储蓄方案是现有的最佳零售投资产品。

sentences.en: The company intends to squeeze further savings from its suppliers.
sentences.cn: 公司试图从供货商那里再省下一笔费用。

sentences.en: The film company collapsed, leaving Chris jobless and minus his life savings.
sentences.cn: 电影公司垮了，克里斯没了工作，也失去了他一生的积蓄。

sentences.en: Trade and product discounts can also mean big savings.
sentences.cn: 商品促销与产品折扣同样意味着可能会省下一大笔钱。

sentences.en: You can enjoy a year's membership for just $28 – a saving of $7 off the regular rate.
sentences.cn: 你只需花$28就可以享受一年的会员资格–比正常会费节省了$7。

words.tran_cn: [金融]储蓄；存款；救助；节省物（saving的复数形式）

trans.tran_cn: 储蓄，节约( saving的名词复数 )，节俭，储蓄金，挽救
trans.tran_en: A saving is a reduction in the amount of time or money that is used or needed
